projectTitle: Project-1:  Advanced Kidney Disease Classification Utilizing MLflow and DVC for Robust Machine Learning Pipelines
projectDetails: This project aims to develop a robust and scalable machine learning pipeline to classify advanced kidney disease stages. Utilizing MLflow for managing the machine learning lifecycle and DVC (Data Version Control) for dataset and model versioning, the project ensures reproducibility and effective collaboration.The core goal is to build an efficient pipeline capable of tracking experiments, managing models, and optimizing machine learning workflows. The classification model, trained on kidney disease datasets, offers accurate predictions and helps healthcare providers monitor disease progression. With MLflow and DVC integrated, the solution is designed for scalability and continuous improvement, allowing healthcare institutions to maintain up-to-date models.

This is a 4 years of a Super store sales data.

Used Tools:

i) Power Query. ii) Merge. iii) Data cleaning.

iv) Modeling. v) Custom Column.

vi) Conditional Column. vii) Pivot Table

viii) Math Function. ix) Different Charts.


Firstly I take the data into power query of excel, Where I clean the data, do data modeling, use merge queries, append queries and load the data as a table format. Then I use some functions and most of the work is done by Pivot Table. Its a two sheet dashboard. First page for Sales Analysis and the other one for Product Analysis.
